abstract.t: This document demonstrates a way for interested SIP User Agentswhich are not a party to the media of a call or session, to receiveSIP event notifications when signaled digits, or other specifictelephony-related events are detected. This is useful for a varietyof applications that monitor calls for a specific event (e.g.: along pound, special sequence of digits, or a fax signal) and--onlythen--take an active role in the monitored calls.
